title: Joseph Fallen
description: There is a fine line between genius and madness…Between love and hate,Between right and wrong.Joseph had created The Estate for her…His wife,The woman he chose to bear his child.She was beauty unsurpassed;And her song was unlike anything he’d ever known.However, their love was a story that would not find a happy ending.In this prequel novella to the Estate series, follow Joseph Carmichael as he creates a world unlike any other. Because, in order to comprehend The Estate, you must understand Joseph; but, in order to understand Joseph, you must discover how a man falls from light into the pitch black depths of ultimate darkness.
author: M.S. Willis
